item.title: Sensory soft play plan for SEN children and adults - and 5 other applications in Chorley & South Ribble
item.description: Plans have been tabled for a sensory soft play centre for neurodiverse children and adults in Chorley. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Chorley plant nursery is told it can't lawfully sell to the public - this is why
item.description: A Chorley nursery loved for its pumpkin picking, bedding plants, seeds and Christmas trees has been told use of the site for retail sales is not lawful. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Chorley pub tackles loneliness brick-by-brick with unique Lego session
item.description: It`s the legendary game that has kept generations of children amused for hours - and now a Chorley pub is bringing Lego lovers of all ages together to tackle loneliness. Source: LEP Preston
